children.name: slider_max_width
children.label: Slider Max Width
children.help_text: Leave blank for the slider to extend to the full width of the page.

children.name: slide_width_px
children.label: Slide Width (px)
children.help_text: *If set to an amount over 100% width of the container, it will be 100% width.
